DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess an investigational medication for patients with chronic renal insufficiency (pre-dialysis) who have secondary hyperparathyroidism.
DOC.brief_title: Study for Secondary Hyperparathyroidism in Chronic Renal Insufficiency Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients must have chronic renal insufficiency (predialysis) Have below normal creatinine clearance Have elevated parathyroid hormone levels Pregnant or nursing Heart attack in the last 3 months.
